definition: to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: Consider colonies producing gas in the Durham tubes as coliforms.
sentences.chinese: 导管内产气的菌落为大肠菌群阳性。

sentences.english: The latter is of white colony, heat resistance and smooth chlamydospores .
sentences.chinese: 后者耐高温，菌落白色并有光滑的厚垣孢子。

sentences.english: The fraction of bacteria recovered curve was traced by colony counting method.
sentences.chinese: 菌落计数法测定和描记细菌恢复生长曲线。

sentences.english: Scientists sampled the bacterial flora from nine newborns and their mothers.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们对9名新生儿和他们的母亲进行了菌落取样。

sentences.english: The probability is high that some of these organisms will be picked up and carried over when a transfer is made .
sentences.chinese: 在移植平板上长出的菌落携带杂菌的机率是相当高的。

sentences.english: Filamentous fungi, commonly known as molds, refer to those that grow as multicellular colonies.
sentences.chinese: 丝状真菌通常被称为霉菌，作为多细胞菌落进行生长。

sentences.english: The color was usually white to yellow.
The colonies are replica-plated onto nitrocellulose filters .
sentences.chinese: 将菌落影印接种在硝酸纤维素滤膜上。

sentences.english: The characterized color of the colony was caused by the production of penicillus and conidium.
sentences.chinese: 特征性的菌落颜色与帚状枝及分生孢子的产生有关。

sentences.english: The biological characteristics of growth rate and colony morphology of single–zoospore isolates were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了单孢分离物菌落形态和菌丝生长速率。

sentences.english: In the biofilm, the distribution of bacteria was consistent with the distribution of exopolysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 生物膜中胞外多糖分布与菌落中的细菌分布一致。

sentences.english: Biofilm could be both a form of protection and a means of migration.
sentences.chinese: 生物膜不经能够保护菌落同时也是一种迁移的方式。

sentences.english: Results The colony count of BLF culture displayed a satisfied consistence with pathological diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 结果BLF菌落计数培养与病理诊断有良好的一致性。

definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
Mr Gram/Dr. Hans Christian Jaochim Gram (1953-1938), Danish doctor and inventor of the Gram stain 革蘭氏染色法|革兰氏染色法
